text: The University of Calcutta (informally known as Calcutta University or CU) is a public state university located in Kolkata (formerly Calcutta), West Bengal, India. It was created on 24 January 1857.Department of Higher Education, West Bengal higherednwb.net. Retrieved 6 August 2012 Within India it is recognized as a "Five-Star University" and a "Centre with Potential for Excellence" by the University Grants Commission and the National Assessment and Accreditation Council. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in India Category:1857 establishments in Asia Category:19th-century establishments in India
title: University of Calcutta
